section_title: Review of the Joint Implementation Guidelines
sentences: This item (FCCC/SBI/2015/5 and INF.1, and FCCC/TP/2015/1) was first considered on Monday, 1 June.
Chair Yauvoli proposed, and parties agreed to, informal consultations co-facilitated by Dimitar Nikov (France) and Yaw Osafo (Ghana).
During the SBI closing plenary on Thursday, 11 June, the SBI adopted conclusions.
